        Parameters:

      • getVersionNoteJSON

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{modDate: [0-9]+}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public es.unex.giiis.pi.rednotes.model.NoteVersion getVersionNoteJSON(@PathParam(value="idn")
                                                                                                                                                   long idn,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="modDate")
                                                                                                                                                   long modDateInt,
                                                                                                                                                   @Context
                                                                                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method, it's called when we need the information of a specific version of a note
        Parameters:
        idn - id of the note we want to return in the JSON
        modDate - int for convert to Date (Java.util.Date) that identify the version of the note idn that we want to return
        request -
        Returns:
        NoteVersion of the Note 'idn' with modification Date like 'modDate'
